one_reviews_text:
Very innovative, and as an Indonesian I am very proud because there are developers from Indonesia who are serious about working on a good VR game product, showing Indonesian art and characteristics that all people around the world need to know.

Again, this is really cool because besides this game there are also other games from the developer that make VR games for musical instruments or other Balinese gamelan.

My advice, maybe it would be great if the multiplayer feature was made and each player could play gamelan music simultaneously, aka collaboration. This is just a suggestion, not a criticism. I hope it will be realized.

Overall, this game deserves to be developed and disseminated to promote arts in Indonesia, especially Bali, where Bali is the center of the island most frequently visited by foreigners around the world.
review_feedback: thanks for your review. Our development team is developing a multiplayer version and can use more musical instruments and avatars
for update gameplay music instrumental and other information check Instagram @rapidraidgames
